title: Wire frame
para: We will require certain information about the website and our website designer will confirm about the target audience, the key products and services, and the layout that you wish to consider.

title: web desing
para: After a kickoff meeting, we will work on your website design and deliver the first cut of your website for your review. First draft includes color theme, your website user interface, icons selections, website layout and responsiveness on different devices.

title: development
para: After reviewing first draft we will get your feedback. If there are any revisions then we will get it done. These revisions include anything you wanted to change from icons to website layout. Revisions aren’t completed until you’re 100% satisfied.

title: final delivery
para: Upon revisions finalization and your approval we will bring your website live at your domain within 24 to 48 hours.
